message: The pork is smoky and tender—exactly what sinuglaw needs.
The fresh crunch from the cucumber and onion makes every bite refreshing.
The chilies give just the right kick without overpowering the dish.
Great balance! The sourness, saltiness, and freshness work together well.
Nice execution—even with a different order, the flavors came together.
Not the usual path, but the result still tastes like proper sinuglaw!
Too much vinegar made the dish overly sharp and mouth-puckering.
The vinegar is too strong—it’s overpowering the pork and vegetables.
Way too much vinegar ruined the balance of flavors.
The vinegar completely took over—this no longer tastes like sinuglaw.
